headline: Assessing Evergy (EVRG) Valuation: Is There Still Upside After Recent Steady Gains?
summary: Evergy (EVRG) shares have stayed fairly steady, closing most recently at $75.59. With the company’s past year return at 26% and revenue growing by 5%, investors may be weighing its next moves. See our latest analysis for Evergy. Momentum has picked up for Evergy this year, with its 22.6% year-to-date share price return standing out against more modest moves in recent months. Over the longer term, investors have enjoyed a robust total shareholder return of nearly 62% over five years,...
